html:
11.13.18  9:09 pm   Time is something that you can do not have to do right?

     sure

11.13.18  9:04 pm   should i join my school's marching band even though i'm a sophomore and everyone else has been doing it since freshman year

     sure

11.13.18  9:02 pm   Are you a human or are you a rogue AI?

     what does rogue mean

11.13.18  8:59 pm   I use a vibrato pedal because I'm indecisive about what exact pitch I should play. What pedal should I get to be more decisive? 

     pitch correction?

11.13.18  8:53 pm   Why are you always so good?

     because i am bad also

11.13.18  8:48 pm   You don't seem to have answered any questions in the last 48 hours. ARE YOU DEAD?!??

     i will check

     I guess you did put out a video, so I'm guessing not.

11.13.18  8:27 pm   What is your ultimate goal in life?

     keep having better goals

11.13.18  8:09 pm   What's your opinion on cursing,

     it sounds like building a boat

      and what did it used to be if it was different?

     i think it used to mean wishing bad upon someone, and now it means saying certain words from a special list maintained by a special group who claim to hate the words in the list yet unfortunately probably have to think about them a lot in order to maintain the list

      Why do you always speak in all-lowercase?

     mostly lowercase, not all. almost everyone i know speaks in mostly lowercase. it is just tradition of society at this point

      How often do you answer these questions?

     i can't tell you

      Do you like answering questions?

     it is a good learning experience, at least for me

      Please answer all of these, in order, if you can.
Thanks in advance.

11.13.18  8:05 pm   Are you working on an album? 

     i prefer to let the songs roam free

11.13.18  7:58 pm   Can you tell me what a low pass filter is please?

     high cut! cut the high. leave the low. you're hearing just the low. like you are in a car with the windows closed and someone is playing music outside the car. or you are in an under water swimming tank, and someone is playing music outside the tank. or you are outside the tank and someone is playing music in the tank. i think you can imagine what this sounds like. or you have pillows over your ears. etc.

11.13.18  7:46 pm   How do you feel about trumpets?

     very good

11.13.18  7:36 pm   if you owned a museum what would you put on display

     midi cables

11.13.18  7:23 pm   just listened 2 slow down, how's it going with that bossa nova deprogramming coach?

     pretty good

11.13.18  7:10 pm   Once you free your mind about a concept of
Harmony and of music being "correct"
You can do whatever you want

thoughts on this quote? 

     well that's just common sense. in fact there's really no choice. try to find something correct, there's nothing there. it's like the shipment didn't show up

11.13.18  7:01 pm   what is the probability of dancing rainbows?

     rainbows do even better, they actually are in many places at once. this is what dancing tries to acheive and yet constantly fails with every step

11.13.18  6:49 pm   what is your opinion on humanity as a whole

     very giving, and generous

11.13.18  6:41 pm   You're making songs so quickly now.
Why not just 'slow down'

     that would be irresponsible

11.13.18  6:36 pm   r u a witch?

     i've never thought about it but i might be

11.13.18  6:14 pm   how far away do u think u must go to get away

     0 meters

11.13.18  6:00 pm   Help, i listened to your music and it made me happy. Why???

     perhaps i did a good job, or else there is some other forces at play

11.13.18  5:50 pm   How do you resign if you don't have a job?

     gotta get one first

11.13.18  5:49 pm   Can I use an electric razor to shave my piano?

     sure. you can use a pencil

11.13.18  5:44 pm   Is there a trope in TV/movies/books that you particularly despise?

     i like them all

11.13.18  5:43 pm   What's your favorite and least favorite area of whatever town/city you live in?

     least favorite is the trash cans (residential) and my favorite place would be the land fill

11.13.18  5:41 pm   Oh! Did you just give us your video-making tutorial in the video for Slow Down? 

     that was a fictional one, although it has some resemblences to the real process

11.13.18  5:41 pm   How long of a journey is it

     i'd say it's about a medium size

11.13.18  5:34 pm   Love your new video. Why do a lot of your songs end with the same melody (and chords) repeated over different lyrics and a sort of little keyboard solo ?

     hopefully it's good, but if it's not then i should really stop doing that

11.13.18  5:33 pm   Is self-loathing ever a good thing?

     for about 15 to 17 seconds

11.13.18  5:32 pm   do we all need to slow down?

     no

11.13.18  5:29 pm   how do i stop falling in love with strangers?

     fall in love with someone completely imaginary. which is similar to what you've been doing, but slightly more advanced

11.13.18  5:23 pm   how has it daily been today?

     today has been 2 days

11.13.18  5:18 pm   Slow Down is great! You mixed it up big time with this one, I felt the element of surprise was potent the whole time! Wonderful job. What key do you think the next song will be in?

     not F, probably not F#, and hopefully not Bb

11.13.18  4:29 pm   how do you feel about abbreviating "i am going to" as "ima"?

     ight

11.13.18  4:11 pm   Are you uploading a video today? 

     yes

11.13.18  3:52 pm   are you going to upload a song today

     yes

      or have you abandoned your upload schedule again

     no

11.13.18  3:34 pm   i want to break free but i don't have the resources, what am i to do?

     sometimes you can just take away some of the resources used to build whatever you are trapped in. unbuild it, if that makes sense

11.13.18  3:12 pm   hi bill, i seen a picture of a painting on your Instagram (posted on the 19th of September). and i was wondering if you painted it yourself, or was it a gift from someone ?

     that was in a hotel. the reason i posted that picture is that was the origin of the mt. st. helens song

11.13.18  1:35 pm   Help my friends don't like your music

     my friends don't like your questions

11.13.18  12:35 pm   Have you ever taken guitar lessons?

     no

11.13.18  12:13 pm   is it really a modulation if you don't change the key ? like if i go from c major to g mixolydian does it really count

     i say spend more time going to c, g, mixo, anything, any key, spend more time going to these keys rather than thinking about saying words like 'modulation' ........ unless .... you enjoy saying words, like modulation and others, which is actually very enjoyable, in which case make sure to spend time with words/writing also. what the heck, mix it together with music, that's always great too

11.13.18  11:22 am   What the? No New questions? You have caused confusion and delay! 

     that's because i was making a piece of content in a much much shorter shorter time period than normal for that size of content

11.13.18  10:50 am   Are you Mentally Ok? 

     yes!~!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

11.13.18  8:17 am   What do babies come from 

     2 other babies

11.13.18  7:58 am   I like your new song "Slow Down" (also, does it have any meaning?)

     it's a blues

11.13.18  3:10 am   maybe you could spend some time collecting the information on when each recent song was written and recorded (maybe on the lyrics page) so people don't have to ask anymore? 

     most songs would require a short biographical piece to explain when it comes from. that is tempting to do, and so are a million more small or slightly longer biographical pieces. i will do them all sometime when i have 1,000 years to spare

11.13.18  12:50 am   I want to start writing a suspense/horror novel. What scare you the most?

     novels

11.13.18  12:42 am   have you ever explored corrupting your audio files while making a song?

     no but perhaps i should. i've done it with visual files

11.13.18  12:35 am   Do you talk to yourself out loud while you answer these question?

     it might be the only time i don't

11.13.18  12:17 am   if you were invited onto react (like youtubers react), would you accept?
i wouldn't expect you to because that doesn't seem like the type of thing you'd do. (though i have to admit i would VERY much enjoy seeing you on it)

     i was invited, we we're gonna do it at vidcon but neither of us had time

11.13.18  12:10 am   any plans on going on a tour?

     yes
